place: 2 Square Robiac, 192 rue de Grenelle, Paris VII
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Miss Bollach: Many thanks for your letter. I could not reply as my eyes were dilated with scopolamine and at twelve oâ€™clock today I enter the clinique for a 7th eye operation! Please excuse me. I have a long piece that I wanted you to be kind enough to type for me but it must wait till I come out when I hope you will not be so overworked. With many thanks Sincerely yours James Joyce
